column3: Fix several compile and warning issues
column4:
Fixed some small compile issues in material.h
Silenced the signed v.s. unsigned comparison warnings in textWriter.h & uniformAccelerator.h
Silenced the gcc warnings about friend declaration on non-templated function in baseImage.h
Fixed gcc compile issues in distanceField3.h
Fixed an indentation in grid3.cpp
Fixed an undefined behavior in rng.h
Fixed a compile issue in vec6.h (there's no "w")
Fixed a compile issue in binaryDataStream.h (there is no "closeStream()" method)
Fixed a compile issue in binaryDataStream.h (need to add the "typename" identifier)
Fixed a compile issue in binaryDataBuffer.h (should be openmode instead of open_mode)
Silenced a unused variable warning in utility.h

column3: mLib compile error in VS2017 + CUDA 9.1
column4:
I want to use this lib to build the bundlefusion server using VS2017 + CUDA9.1.
I meet a C2280 error: attempting to reference a deleted function in D3D11Canvas2D.h:
the error happen in auto _e = e.castBillboard:

![2018-02-01 10 33 09](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3665120/35658285-868640d6-073b-11e8-8145-dabac180958a.png)

I not sure this error is the IDE bug or the mLib bug?

column3: Bug fix for 3D textures and OBJ files
column4:
- The template argument in the class D3D11Texture3D was incorrect (RGBColor instead of T)
- The method loadFromOBJ didn't work correctly if the OBJ file used relative indices. This has been fixed now.
